channel.title: GCC on Vcvc Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GCC on Vcvc Blog

item.title: Variable function(fun(char *, ...)) and vsnprintf()
item.description: void fun(char * fmt, …); int vsprintf(char *str, const char *format, va_list arg); Test programming #include <stdio.h> #include <stdarg.h> /* * Re: https://github.com/antirez/kilo/kilo.c * Re: https://www.runoob.com/cprogramming/c-function-vsprintf.html */ char buffer[80]; int editorSetstatus(const char * fmt, ...) { va_list ap; va_start(ap, fmt); int ret; ret = vsnprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer - 1), fmt, ap); va_end(ap); return (ret); } int main(int argc, char **argv) { int len = 20; editorSetstatus("%d", len); printf("%s \n", buffer); return 0; } gcc -Wall -g fun.
